name: Snail Hop
description:
Can you save your snail friend?

In this retro style platformer game you control the little snail that has lost its partner, Snaily.

Avoid enemies and pits by jumping through 20 colorful levels, collect salad leaves and travel through pipes (sounds familiar?).

Can you rescue your snail partner?

Please leave a comment if you like the game,

Thank you!

Ingame-Controls
